channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Silicon Valley Hasn’t Embraced Trump. But It’s Wavering on Biden
item.description: Venture capitalists on both sides of the aisle suggest Silicon Valley is more anti-Biden than it is pro-Trump.
